## alterNode() function

This function should be passed to HTML component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function alterNode(node: HTMLNode): false;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | HTMLNode | A node from htmlparser2 library. |
